title: Excuseme
body:
Excuseme, how i can record my games?{{champion:103}} 
Thanks summoner n_n

replies.body: As *Ironfield* mentioned, replays are on the map for release at a later time. There are a ton of applications out there that can record League, but it really depends on if you want a *full recording of the game* or just a little snippet of a cool moment where you got that pentakill or that epic baron steal over the wall. ^.^

Hello summoner! I believe during next season riot is introducing a replay system. 

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/client/client-features/road-pre-season-replays-horizon
